overview: Ho Je remarried Hyeon Ah. He thinks wives and girlfriends are different things and refuses to sleep with Hyeon Ah. Although she's upset, she keeps it in for the sake of his wealth and comforts herself with hosts, but she's still feeling empty inside. Meanwhile, Ho Je's daughter Ho Yeon feels something strange between her boyfriend Joo Cheol and Hyeon Ah and offers Hyeon Ah 50 million won for sleeping with her father. Hyeon Ah thinks this is the perfect chance to get rid of Ho Je's girlfriend and accepts.
title: Love Affair: A Secret Affair
